attributes.action: To stop the planned BBC cuts to it's services such as 6music, website and the Asian Network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 2nd of March 2010 the BBC Director General published plans to the BBC trust to limit and close some of it's services such as the Asian Network, 6Music and others.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent from government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
